title: Episode 41 – Addison Luck on the Global “Rights of Nature” Movement
subtitle: Sarah Arao Mantle of Hope- Thank You Video to the Y on Earth Community for GoFundMe Campaign Support
description: Your donations are going a very long way in making this and other podcast episodes possible as well as our monthly pulse meetups where we are building soil, working in community, planting trees, connecting with boats from all walks of life.
